attributes.action: A referendum on having power devolved to the regions of England
attributes.additional_details:
I am calling for a referendum in the regions of England on having devolved regional assemblies win the same power as the other assemblies that currently exist within the UK

Because the regions of England vary greatly socially,economically and politically so a English parliament would not be anymore representative of the regions of England than the current political set-up. This would bring many of the key decisions that effect peoples lives closer to home such as the NHS and local authority finances

rejection.details:
Please see below petition:

Petition Title: We need Regional Assemblies not an English Parliament

Created by: George Lyons

Closing: 30/03/2015
